name: Genashtim Innovative Learning
description: Geneshtim creating a workplace that is inclusive and accessible, especially for those with disabilities, we had to develop a 100% work-from-home model. This also led us to build a totally digitalized operation, focussing on eLearning.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Empowering People, Enabling Business
ShortDescription: Genashtim was founded in 2008 with the purpose of providing sustainable, meaningful, and gainful employment for the disadvantaged, especially for those from the less-developed economies.
enhanced_description: Genashtim Innovative Learning is an HR technology solution founded in 2008, specifically designed to foster inclusive and accessible workplaces. It operates on a 100% work-from-home model with a totally digitalized operation, focusing on eLearning. The core purpose of Genashtim is to provide sustainable, meaningful, and gainful employment, particularly for individuals with disabilities and those from less developed economies. Categorized under Recruiting and Talent Management, the solution aims to help organizations hire top talent faster and more efficiently, while simultaneously boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Sourcing and recruiting talent from a diverse pool, including individuals with disabilities.
Facilitating the establishment and management of 100% work-from-home employment models.
Accessing and integrating talent from less developed economies.
Improving overall efficiency in talent acquisition processes.
Enhancing hiring manager confidence in remote and diverse talent sourcing.
competitive_advantages: Specialized focus on inclusive employment for individuals with disabilities.
Proven expertise in operating and supporting a 100% work-from-home model.
Commitment to social impact by providing employment in less developed economies.
Leveraging a totally digitalized operation with an emphasis on eLearning for efficiency and accessibility.
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient talent acquisition.
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity.
Access to a broader and more diverse talent pool (including disabled individuals and those from less developed economies).
